_sText:
This is one of my first jail maps and i think it's the best

Buildings: 

* Weaponsroom
* Pool
* Disco
* Hospital
* Elevator to the highest Point ot the map
* Soccerplace

Jails:

* One breakable wall
* One teleporter
* one USP

Specifications:

The map has shootable Lights and a great soccerplace. Also included are 4 mini Jails for those who were caught escaping or something like that. Before the CT's open the door to the jailsbuilding only the jails inside are full of light. The outer room is half dark. A nice detail I think.

Try and wonder XD

==============================================

The map contains place for

16 terrorists
19 Counter-Terrorists


==============================================

Special thanks to the mapper of ba_jail_electric_raor_v2 for the "tutorial" for a good soccerplace
